India's Champions Trophy And England Series Squad Live: Drama Over Rohit Sharma's Deputy? - NDTV Sports
summary:
India's Champions Trophy 2025 And England Series Squad Announcement Live

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: NDTV

The BCCI selection committee, led by Ajit Agarkar, is nearing the deadline for announcing the squads for the Champions Trophy and the England series. The provisional squads must be submitted by February 12, with changes allowed until February 13. The selection committee is poised to make significant decisions following India's recent 1-3 Test series loss to Australia.

  • All teams must submit provisional squads by February 12.
  • Possible delays in the Champions Trophy squad announcement.
  • Key players like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli are expected to be included.
  • The selection committee may make tough calls regarding the team composition due to recent performance.
“Shami is likely to return into the ODI side. There is a possibility of Arshdeep Singh in ODI.”

This announcement is highly anticipated as it will inform fans about the direction of Team India's cricket strategy ahead of major international competitions.
newTitle: Drama Over Rohit Sharma's Deputy in India's Champions Trophy Squad

title: Ahead of farewell address on Wednesday, Biden says party doubted he could ‘even move’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Biden Reflects on Party Doubts Ahead of Farewell Address

Publication Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent statement, outgoing US President Joe Biden expressed that doubts from his party about his ability to lead led to his decision to withdraw from the upcoming presidential race, despite believing he could win against Donald Trump.

  • Biden stated he would have won the presidential election had he not stepped back for party unity.
  • He emphasized the importance of unifying the Democratic Party during a press conference.
  • Biden believes both he and Kamala Harris could have defeated Trump.
  • His farewell address is scheduled for January 15, where he will reflect on his public service career.
  • Despite controversies, Biden underscored his commitment to the party's success over personal ambitions.
“I thought I could win again, I thought it was better to unify the party.”

Biden's withdrawal has been a significant topic, with many implications for the Democratic Party's future and strategies moving forward.
newTitle: Biden Reflects on Party Doubts Ahead of Farewell Address

HMPV Case LIVE: China in close contact with WHO on respiratory diseases, India reports cases in Gujarat, Maha, etc | Today News - Mint
summary:
HMPV Case LIVE: China in close contact with WHO on respiratory diseases, India reports cases in Gujarat, Maha, etc

Publication Date: 11 Jan, 2025 7:19:14 AM
Source: Business News

Amid heightened surveillance in India, another HMPV case was reported in Gujarat on Friday. Meanwhile, China has confirmed that it is in close communication with the World Health Organisation (WHO) regarding respiratory diseases, including HMPV.

  • A new case of HMPV was reported in Ahmedabad, increasing the total in Gujarat to three.
  • The Chinese government emphasizes that HMPV is not new and has been circulating for over 60 years.
  • China's foreign ministry spokesperson labeled the term 'mysterious' for HMPV as alarmist and against scientific common sense.
“HMPV infections manifest themselves as a self-limiting disease,” Guo said.

The World Health Organisation stated that the surge in respiratory illnesses, including HMPV, is typically caused by seasonal epidemics.
newTitle: HMPV Case LIVE: China and WHO Communication on Respiratory Diseases as India Reports New Cases

title: California wildfires: What sparked the blaze? Investigators explore multiple causes - Hindustan Times
summary:
California Wildfires: What Sparked the Blaze?

Date: January 10, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

At least 11 people have died and thousands of homes and businesses have been destroyed in massive fires in the Los Angeles area, with investigators looking into possible ignition sources.

  • Investigators are examining multiple potential causes for the fires, having ruled out lightning.
  • Prominent figures such as Hollywood stars Jamie Lee Curtis and Billy Crystal have lost their homes in the blaze.
  • Utility line sparks and intentional fires are also being considered as possible sources of ignition.
  • Southern California Edison has reported findings to regulators concerning the Eaton Fire.
  • The 2017 Thomas Fire serves as a historical reference for similar incidents caused by utility lines.
“It’s going to go out when it runs out of fuel, or when the weather stops,” said John Lentini, owner of Scientific Fire Analysis.

The situation remains critical, with the fires continuing to spread and further investigations underway to determine the exact causes.
newTitle: California Wildfires: Investigating Multiple Causes Behind the Blazes

India's Champions Trophy squad announcement postponed, BCCI requests ICC for extension, new date is…: Report - Hindustan Times
summary:
BCCI Postpones India's Champions Trophy Squad Announcement

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The BCCI has requested an extension from the ICC for announcing India's squad for the Champions Trophy, which was initially scheduled for January 12, in order to finalize their selection.

  • The announcement delay stems from the BCCI's request for more time to finalize the squad.
  • Teams were expected to name provisional squads five weeks before the tournament, but the BCCI is citing recent commitments in Australia.
  • The new date for announcing the squad is likely January 19, one month before the tournament starts.
  • The provisional squad is expected to see mostly the same players as those in the ODI series against England.
  • India's T20I squad against England is also expected to be announced shortly.
  • A review meeting will involve BCCI officials, captain Rohit Sharma, and coach Gautam Gambhir.
The BCCI aims to finalize the squad while addressing recent performance issues after a disappointing series against Australia.

The BCCI's careful planning aims to ensure that the squad is well-prepared following recent overseas matches, indicating a strategic approach to the upcoming Champions Trophy.
newTitle: BCCI Postpones India's Champions Trophy Squad Announcement

title: Manoj Tiwary Recalls Gautam Gambhir's Old Overseas Coaches Remark, Defends 'Hypocrite' Tag - NDTV Sports
Top startup and tech stories this week - The Economic Times
summary:
Top Startup and Tech Stories This Week

Date: This week

Source: ETtech

Welcome to a new edition of ETtech Unwrapped – our weekend newsletter packed with the most important stories this week. Here are the top highlights:

  • Exclusive Q&A with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella: He emphasizes the need for the US to innovate and compete, stating, "Anyone who doesn't tap into India's human capital is choosing not to be competitive."
  • Kabeer Biswas joins Flipkart: The cofounder of Dunzo will lead Flipkart’s quick commerce business, Minutes.
  • Improved Financials for Startups: Several startups have ended FY24 with improved bottom lines despite funding challenges.
  • NRAI to approach CCI: The National Restaurant Association of India may challenge Zomato and Swiggy over their new 10-minute food delivery offerings.
  • Sachin Bansal’s potential sale of Ola stake: Flipkart’s cofounder is reportedly in talks to sell his $100 million investment in Ola at a premium.
  • Innovaccer raises $275 million: The SaaS firm closes a new funding round for AI and cloud development.
  • Swiggy launches multiple delivery apps: New apps introduced include Pyng for professional services and Snacc for quick food delivery.
  • Data protection regulations: The new DPDP rules may open opportunities for regulatory-tech firms in compliance and privacy sectors.
Saty Nadella asserted that tech and non-tech distinctions will disappear as we embrace AI.

Overall, the tech landscape is evolving with significant investments, strategic leadership changes, and regulatory developments that may shape the future of startups in India.
newTitle: Top Startup and Tech Stories This Week

AAP MLA Gurpreet Gogi dies after ‘accidentally’ shooting himself, says police - The Hindu
AAP MLA Gurpreet Gogi dies after ‘accidentally’ shooting himself, says police - The Hindu
AAP MLA Gurpreet Gogi shoots himself accidentally, declared dead - The Hindu
summary:
AAP MLA Gurpreet Gogi Accidentally Shoots Himself and is Declared Dead

Publication Date: January 11, 2025 Source: The Hindu

Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) MLA Gurpreet Gogi has been pronounced dead after accidentally shooting himself, resulting in serious head injuries. The incident took place around midnight.

  • Gurpreet Gogi sustained bullet injuries to his head and was declared dead at the hospital.
  • The Deputy Commissioner of Police stated that the shooting was accidental as per family accounts.
  • The cause of death will be confirmed once the post-mortem report is available.
  • Gogi, who joined AAP in 2022, previously defeated a two-time Congress MLA during the Ludhiana assembly elections.
“The incident happened around midnight, and he was declared dead when he was brought to the DMC hospital...” - DCP Jaskaran Singh

Further investigations into the incident are currently underway.
newTitle: AAP MLA Gurpreet Gogi Accidentally Shoots Himself and is Declared Dead

title: Delhi-NCR foggy, rain expected; flight and train operations likely to be hit again - Hindustan Times
summary:
Delhi-NCR foggy, rain expected; flight and train operations likely to be hit again

Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

The national capital is experiencing dense fog, which severely reduced visibility, causing over 100 flights and several train services to be delayed. The weather is expected to continue affecting transportation, with rain predicted over the weekend.

  • Flight and train delays: Zero visibility due to fog has significantly disrupted flight and train operations, leading to multiple advisories issued by IGI airport.
  • Rain predictions: Light rain and thunderstorms are anticipated, with current temperatures below normal.
  • Air Quality Index (AQI): The AQI reached 'severe' levels, peaking at 409 due to high pollution levels.
  • Accidents linked to fog: Multiple accidents occurred due to low visibility, causing injuries and fatalities.
"Dense fog was seen in parts of Delhi on Saturday morning, leading to the delay of 100 flights and several trains."

Overall, the persistent fog and deteriorating air quality continue to pose challenges for residents and transportation in the Delhi-NCR region.
newTitle: Delhi-NCR Fog Causes Disruptions in Flight and Train Operations

title: Fateh box office collection Day 1: Sonu Sood starrer off to a slow start with Rs 2.45 crore debut - TOI Etimes
summary:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 1: Sonu Sood Starrer Off to a Slow Start with Rs 2.45 Crore Debut

Publication Date: [Date not provided] Source: Times of India

The much-anticipated action film Fateh, featuring Sonu Sood, opened to a subdued box office collection of Rs 2.45 crore on its first day.

  • The film revolves around themes of cybercrime, justice, and resilience.
  • Initial predictions estimated the film's first-day collection to be between Rs 70 lakh and Rs 1 crore.
  • Sood's return as a lead actor was highly anticipated, especially after his philanthropic work during the pandemic.
  • Fateh faces tough competition from major releases such as Ram Charan's Game Changer and Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2.
  • Industry experts suggest that positive word-of-mouth may improve the film's performance over the weekend.
  • Salman Khan showed support for Fateh, connecting it with a song he previously contributed to.
“I also have a contribution in the film Fateh. The song 'Heer' was very dear to me, but now it is part of this film.” - Salman Khan

As the weekend progresses, the success of 'Fateh' is dependent on audience response and critical reception.
newTitle: Fateh Box Office Collection: A Slow Start for Sonu Sood's Film

title: Yuzvendra Chahal breaks his silence on divorce rumours with Dhanashree Verma: 'I shall forever strive to seek your love and support and not sympathy' - TOI Etimes
summary:
Yuzvendra Chahal Addresses Divorce Rumours with Dhanashree Verma

Publication Date: October 2023   Source: Times of India

Cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal and choreographer Dhanashree Verma have been subject to divorce rumors after unfollowing each other on social media. Both have since addressed the speculation in separate statements.

  • Chahal expressed gratitude to fans while stressing the need to avoid speculation about his personal life.
  • Dhanashree revealed the emotional toll the rumors have taken on her family.
  • They both called for a stop to the baseless claims and highlighted their commitment to personal values and truth.
Chahal stated, "I shall forever strive to seek your love & support and not sympathy."

Both have emphasized the importance of focusing on their careers and integrity amidst the scrutiny.
newTitle: Yuzvendra Chahal Addresses Divorce Rumours with Dhanashree Verma
